A Cochrane Review 2004 recommend administration sucrose 0.24-0.48 g ( 1-2 ml 24 % sucrose solution ) . It reduce PIPP scale rate 20 % . Our purpose compare antinociceptive effect 1 ml 30 % sucrose solution administer 2 minute heel lance v blood sample heel lance breastfeeding .
